mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTNER (BUSINESSNUMBER, CONTACTNAME, COMPANYNAME, EMAIL, ADDRESS, SETTLEMENTACCOUNT, PHONENUMBER, CEONAME, APPROVAL, REGISTRATIONDATE, SECTORS) VALUES (#{businessNumber}, #{contactName}, #{companyName}, #{email}, #{address}, #{settlementAccount}, #{phoneNumber}, #{ceoName},0, #{registrationDate},#{sectors})
mapper.select: SELECT BUSINESSNUMBER FROM PARTNER WHERE BUSINESSNUMBER = #{businessNumber}
